purpose: To develop an AI agent capable of playing Tetris at a high level using deep reinforcement learning techniques.
principle: Employs Q-learning, a type of model-free reinforcement learning algorithm, to optimize the agent's decision-making in the game of Tetris.
reusability: The code can be adapted to train reinforcement learning models for other games or applications by modifying the environment and reward structure.
limitations: Performance is limited by the complexity of the Tetris game and the computational resources available for training the model.
name: tetris-ai
description: A deep reinforcement learning bot that plays tetris
highlight: A deep reinforcement learning bot specifically designed to master the game of Tetris using Q-learning.
